reviewText: This movie is excellent family fare and teaches adults that they need to listen to their kids more.  Sometimes they know more than the adults do and can help in many situations.  The acting is good and the story line is believable.

a very pleasant light movie suitable for a younger audience storyline was ok not compicated.the talking animals added to the charm of this movie and i would not recommend it to the older age group it would probably be a little dull.i liked it the lessons in the story were clear for a younger child to understand

Cute story line for kids under 11 years old.
Bradley Pierce is a good boy actor and
he should go far in the industry.
good family movie, boy who can talk to his pets and they talk to him. how he gets in trouble for things that they have told him. how he and his pets save the President and catch the bad guys
